level.text: 1607.1 A licensed applicant who holds a valid class C or D license issuedursuant to the District of Columbia Alcoholic Beverage Control Act, D.C.fficial Code ยง 25-101 et seq., shall be exempt from the notice and hearingrovisions of this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9292, 9296 (December 11, 1992); asmended by Notice of emergency and proposed rulemaking at 52 DCR 8531(September6, 2005) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 521, 526January 8, 2010).

level.heading: EDITOR’S NOTE
level.text: Section 1607 published at 39 DCR 9292 (December 11, 1992)as no corresponding section in Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 521January 8, 2010).
